mapper.select: select 'user-' || max(to_number(user_id)) as businessId from sys_user union all select 'role-' || max(to_number(role_id)) as businessId from sys_role union all select 'userRole-' || max(to_number(user_role_id)) as businessId from sys_user_role union all select 'roleMenu-' || max(to_number(role_menu_id)) as businessId from sys_role_menu union all select 'income-' || max(to_number(income_id)) as businessId from sys_income union all select 'gift-' || max(to_number(gift_id)) as businessId from sys_gift union all select 'notice-' || max(to_number(notice_id)) as businessId from sys_notice union all select 'loginLog-' || max(to_number(log_id)) as businessId from sys_login_log union all select 'menu-' || max(to_number(menu_id)) as businessId from sys_menu

select case when count(1) > 0 then '1' else '0' end buttonAuthority from sys_user_role a, sys_role_menu b, sys_menu c where a.role_id = b.role_id and b.menu_id = c.menu_id and a.user_id = #{userId} and c.parent_id = #{menuId} and c.menu_type = '3'

select case when count(1) > 0 then '1' else '0' end dataAuthority from sys_user_role a, sys_role_menu b, sys_menu c where a.role_id = b.role_id and b.menu_id = c.menu_id and a.user_id = #{userId} and c.menu_id = '20190000000000' and c.is_enable = '1' and c.menu_type = '4'
select count(1) from user_tables where lower(table_name) in (${tableName})

select lower(a.column_name) columnCode, lower(a.data_type) columnType from user_tab_columns a, user_col_comments b where a.table_name = b.table_name and a.column_name = b.column_name and a.table_name = upper(#{tableName}) order by a.column_id
